item.title: Short Video: Should the Private Sector Ever Share Data, Even if for Public Good?
item.description: Senior Transport Economist Holly Krambeck shares her experiences filling gaps in traditional data collection for transport infrastructure projects by forming data sharing partnerships. She then introduces the World Bank’s new initiative to scale these partnerships, making them more efficient, effective, and responsible. Sorry, your browser doesn't support embedded videos.
